message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,500. I know you'll find it valuable.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $10,500 is too low for me. How about we settle at $11,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to go up to $10,750. Can you meet me there?
